name: neu-smart

””Alexa, turn on bedroom light””

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ABOUT THIS SKILL 
If you have any problems, please contact us at info@neu-smart.com. NEUsmart offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience with Alexa. Control your home lighting and other devices hands-free. Just say it, NEUsmart will obey. Here's a step by step guide.
 Download our "NEU-smart" app in Google Play or iOS App Store
 Launch the app and register a new account (or login if you're already registered)
 Turn on NEUsmart devices and connect them with "NEU-smart" app
 IMPORTANT! You can rename the devices with NEU-smart App. So if you rename a NEUsmart light bulb as "Living Room Light", then Echo will get that same name after discovering the device in Step 9
 Download “Amazon"Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app
Search the Alexa Skills directory for "NEU-smart"
Click Enable skill of "NEU-smart", then input your account username, password and region on the linking page
 Talk to Echo "Alexa, discover devices." Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed"
 Now all setup is done. Try talking to Echo to control your devices. Here are the voice commands NEUsmart has:

Lights:
* Alexa, turn on my living room light
* Alexa, turn off my living room light
* Alexa, dim my living room light
* Alexa, brighten my living room light
* Alexa, set the living room light to 20 percent
* Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
